description: The fund invests at least 80% of its total assets in the securities of the underlying index and in American Depositary Receipts ("ADRs") and Global Depositary Receipts ("GDRs") based on the securities in the underlying index. The underlying index is designed to provide exposure to exchange-listed companies that are active in the cannabis industry (collectively, " Cannabis Companies"), as defined by Solactive AG, the provider of the underlying index ("index provider"). The fund is non-diversified.
name: Global X Cannabis ETF
